data.eml:eml: New records of species of the Polyonyx sinensis group (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Porcellanidae) from Japan, the Philippines, Singapore, and Malaysia, with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Osawa, Masayuki, Naruse, Tohru, Ng, Peter K. L. (2018): New records of species of the Polyonyx sinensis group (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Porcellanidae) from Japan, the Philippines, Singapore, and Malaysia, with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 4429 (2): 303-323, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4429.2.6
